text: Maryam tama caagid Qajibsitak itteh;yi-Rabbow Baxa geyam mannal yoh takkee? Seehadayti digibih yol maxayyoowinnaay anu dalweyna hinniyok itte, malaykatti (jibriil kinnuk) teetik iyyeh, Nab√¢ Yallih caagid tamannaay usuk isih faxam gina, usuk caagiidak caagidik teyna meklaah ginam faxa waqdi, toysa cagalah woo hiimik tik iyyaah edde takke iyye
